plot: Keep Drifting Fun is a cross-country look at drifting culture as a whole, and how it has differentiated itself from other motorsports with style and camaraderie within a similar vein to other extreme action-sports.
title: Keep Drifting Fun
plot_es: Keep Drifting Fun is a cross-country look at drifting culture as a whole, and how it has differentiated itself from other motorsports with style and camaraderie within a similar vein to other extreme action-sports.
plot_en: Keep Drifting Fun is a cross-country look at drifting culture as a whole, and how it has differentiated itself from other motorsports with style and camaraderie within a similar vein to other extreme action-sports.
